About the Company: Ruttonsha International Rectifier Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of Power Semiconductors. The Product range of the company includes:Power semiconductors:-Phase Control Thyristors. Standard Recovery Diodes.Fast Turn-Off Thyristors.Fast Recovery Diodes.Power Modules (Thyristor/Thyristor, Diode/Diode, Diode/Thyristor).Bridge Rectifiers.Water Cooled Assemblies.The company is a major supplier to manufacturers of:Welding Rectifiers.Battery Chargers.Electro plating rectifiers.Invertors.UPS.Soft Starters.D C Drives.Transport vehicles.Induction heaters.
